features: Sliquid Splash is a gentle feminine wash, formulated as always completely glycerin and paraben free.

Great alternatives to traditional soap and water and other harsh detergents. Fragrance formulas are blended with essential oils, coconut derivatives, and sea salt. Sliquid Splash is perfectly balanced to complement a woman’s PH.

Intimate cleansing formula. 100% Vegan friendly. Infused with Certified Organic botanicals. Helps to remove odor causing bacteria. Glycerin free and paraben free. Hypoallergenic and non-toxic. Created as an alternative to harsh soaps. Perfectly balanced to match a woman’s PH.
Condition : 100% Brand New, Packaging : 100% Plain packaging, Shipping : 100% secure and safe [Ships from and sold by Blueparrot Shop]

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle but effective cleanser
reviews.reviewText: This is the best feminine cleanser I've tried. A lot of companies don't realize that scented products aren't the best idea in that area, so I'm happy to see a smaller company with an unscented wash as an option.First off, this cleanses wonderfully. It lathers well, and unless you're using it all over your body, a single bottle lasts quite a while. Every body is different, but I find this to be completely non-irritating, which hasn't been the case with other similar products I've tried. It's great for the more sensitive areas of your body, and it's even gentle enough to use as a face wash; even though I have dry skin, I don't find this to be stripping at all.It is truly unscented. No hidden essential oils, no scent from the compounds making up the product. It's an excellent product for sensitive skin. I've used it for probably 4-5 years and will always repurchase it. If Sliquid ever stops selling this body wash, I will make a one-woman protest until they start producing it again. It's just that good, consistently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's awkward to rate things like this, but I will say this is a good product that works well. I got the unscented kind because usually the scented ones cause irritation for me, but I still feel like it does the trick to both cleanse and reduce any odor. I bought it because I wanted something without sulfates and such but it still foams enough to feel like it's clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using this for years
reviews.reviewText: Religious customer of this. Love that it has all ingredients that I understand. When I’m in a bind/travelling, I’ve even used it for my face since it’s so gentle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for down there....and everywhere!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this based on other customer reviews, and from my experience with other products from this company. This is an excellent product; very gentle and mild, and a little truly goes a long way, so the bottle should last a very long time.I found out that this also makes a great body wash, as I had run out of my regular product, and tried this instead. I have had a mild, non-itchy rash on my upper arm for at least a year now, and nothing has helped to clear it. I have tried different soaps and lotions, as well as dietary changes to no avail. After about seven days of washing with this,the rash is about 75% GONE. I am shocked! So, I guess I have found a new body wash. I love that it is truly non-scented, also. I highly recommend this product and would encourage anyone to try out thier other products.As a side note, the bottle I received was different than the one shown in the picture. Well sealed, and shipped great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 vagina friendly for sure
reviews.reviewText: Love this wash. So much really gives you a clean feeling!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I've been using this for years and I love it. So amazing. The new packaging though is kinda weird. It looks very pretty! And I love that it has a pump but when shipped it seems like it easily leaks.... they're gonna have to wrap these better instead of just throwing in a box like previously cause yea the packaging doesn't hold up like the old one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Love it. I have used natural products for a while, so never tried a feminine wash since my other natural soaps were gentle. Then I began having trouble with dryness and irritation so went looking for a feminine wash. I chose this due to the good reviews, natural ingredients, and fragrance free option as I am allergic to many fragrances.Love this stuff. Very gentle and no more irritation. I also noticed that it said it could be used as body wash, bubble bath, etc. And since I loved it as a feminine wash I began using it as shampoo, face wash, and body wash just to see.My hair is softer and has more body (I was previously using natural shampoo bars which I loved, but this works a little better even!)My acne has improved greatly with healthy eating and using natural skincare products, but since using this as a face wash I have noticed a slight improvement and had almost no acne this month during the time I usually break out. It removes makeup well but is gentle enough not to dry my skin or cause my eyes to sting.Definitely a fan of this stuff. It's cheaper than the fancy organic face washes I was using, but a little more expensive than the bar soap and shampoo bar I had been using. However, it is worth it to me due to the improvement in my skin and hair as well as the convenience. Rather than having shampoo, conditioner, face wash, body wash, and feminine wash...I now just have a bottle of this and a bottle of hair conditioner in my shower. Also much more convenient to pack an all in one product for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product, needs new packaging!
reviews.reviewText: The product is great, been using it for years. However, one of them arrived opened. That’s a bummer since it’s not eligible for returns - not sure if I missed the date in all the holiday madness, but I guess I’m taking a loss.

Probably the best there is, but I still follow with a gentle, natural 'cleansing milk' technically meant for your face but gentle and suitable enough for this purpose - it's the soothing Andalou cleansing milk in the purple bottle. Then I moisturize with a natural oil upon drying. This combination seems to work well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bought before still my go to women’s wash
reviews.reviewText: I’ve bought this product before from another company. It is cheaper where i normally buy it but I will usually order when I get a large order otherwise with shipping it’s cheaper off amazon. It’s my favourite women’s wash I use it for those sensitive areas . I always feel so fresh and clean using this for sure recommend. It is pricey but a little goes a long way it will last a year if you use small amounts, definitely worth the price.
Great product, happy about the unscented wash. Always feeling fresh. Using a dime size works great.
Little to no scent. Non irritating. Perfect
Not the best smell, and has a shimmer which I didn't expect from a "natural" product.
